Package de.ityx.mediatrix.api.interfaces.businessrules.client

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IClientAnswerEdit
    It's called if the answer is edited after it was sent.
    IClientAnswerView
    This methods is called if an answer is shown from the customer history tree.
    IClientAskMe
    textobject suggestion panel.
    IClientBrowserView
    This Rule allowed to use the browser view.
    IClientCaseView
    Is used if a case is viewed in the customer history.
    IClientClassificationValidation
    Is used in the classification view panel
    IClientContactChange
    English:
    The interface is not in use now.
    IClientContex
    English:
    Tha methods are used in the tag match panel and called if the current document is cut, stored or split.
    IClientCustomerView
    Diese Methoden werden aufgerufen, wenn ein Kunde angezeigt wird.
    IClientEventPerformer
    TODO Not in use
    IClientExternalSearch
    The methods are used in search panel.
    IClientExtractionValidation
    The methods are used in the extraction validation panel.
    IClientForwardDialog
    This interface is used to intercept the methods calls in the Question-Forward-Dialog
    IClientLogin
    Methods for the login and logout at the client.
    IClientMailInbox
    This methods are called from context of the mail inbox:
    IClientMailInBoxBeforeQuestionOpen
    Allows to suppress the call of single questions from the MailInbox
    IClientMultiChannel
    It's possible to define incoming and outgoing channels.
    IClientMXAction
    Hierüber können spezielle MX-Codes der Form [mx:action:name] verwendet werden.
    IClientNewEmail
    This methods are called when an new email is to be sent.
    IClientObjectsControl
    Contains store, delete and load functions for main objects like customers, cases, questions ...
    IClientOperatorMode
    This methods are called from the context of Mail-Inbox.
    IClientQuestionAnswerView
    The methods are called if the question answer view panel is active.
    IClientQuestionView
    This Methods are called if a question is viewed from the customer history.
    IClientQuote
    This rule contains methods that allow a customized quoting of the incoming question into the answer.
    IClientRunner
    The class contains important methods for the entire client.
    IClientServiceCenter
    The interface contains the methods for the service center administration panel.
    IClientServiceQuestionView
    This methods are called if a service center question is viewed in the history of a customer.
    IClientSessionLost
    The central module controls the communication with the application server.
    IClientSystem
    Contains common most used functions for the entire application
    IClientTextObject
    Allows to change select text objects.
    IClientWorkCancel
    This methods are called if the operator breaks or continues the work.
    ITemplateMaker
    The methods to manipulate the template for outgoing emails.
